Verses: 1 savul Pelisdharaip Pin Thotarndhu Thirumpivandhapodhu, Idho, Thaaveedhu Enkedhiyin Vanaandharaththil Irukkiraan Endru Avanukku Arivikkappattadhu.
2 appozhudhu Savul: Isravel Anaiththilum Therindhukollappatta Moovaayiramperaik Koottikkontu, Thaaveedhaiyum Avan Manusharaiyum Varaiyaatukalulla Kanmalaikalin Mel Thetapponaan.

3 vazhiyoraththilirukkira Aattuththozhuvangalitaththil Avan Vandhapodhu, Ange Oru Kepi Irundhadhu; Adhile Savul Malajalaadhikkup Ponaan; Thaaveedhum Avan Manusharum Andhak Kepiyin Pakkangalil Utkaarndhirundhaarkal.

4 appozhudhu Thaaveedhin Manushar Avanai Nokki: Idho, Naan Un Saththuruvai Un Kaiyil Oppukkotuppen; Un Paarvaikku Nalamaanapati Avanukkuch Cheyvaayaaka Endru Karththar Unnote Sonna Naal Idhudhaane Endraarkal; Thaaveedhu Ezhundhirundhupoi, Savulutaiya Saalvaiyin Thongalai Mella Aruththukkontaan.
5 thaaveedhu Savulin Saalvaith Thongalai Aruththukkontadhinimiththam Avan Manadhu Atiththukkontirundhadhu.

6 avan Than Manusharaip Paarththu: Karththar Apishekampannina En Aantavanmel En Kaiyaip Potumpatiyaana Ippatippatta Kaariyaththai Naan Seyyaadhapatikku, Karththar Ennaik Kaappaaraaka; Avar Karththaraal Apishekam Pannappattavar Endru Solli,
7 than Manusharaich Chavulin Mel Ezhumpa Ottaamal, Ivvaarththaikalinaal Avarkalaith Thataipanninaan; Savul Ezhundhirundhu, Kepiyaivittu, Vazhiye Natandhuponaan.

8 appozhudhu Thaaveedhum Ezhundhu, Kepiyilirundhu Purappattu, Savulukkup Pinnaakap Poi: Raajaavaakiya En Aantavane Endru Kooppittaan; Savul Thirumpip Paarththapodhu, Thaaveedhu Tharaimattum Mukangunindhu Vanangi,
9 savulai Nokki: Thaaveedhu Umakkup Pollaappuch Cheyyappaarkkiraan Endru Sollukira Manusharutaiya Vaarththaikalai En Ketkireer?

10 idho, Karththar Indru Kepiyil Ummai En Kaiyil Oppukkotuththaar Enpadhai Indraiyadhinam Ummutaiya Kankal Kantadhe, Ummaik Kondrupotaventum Endru Silar Sonnaarkal; Aanaalum En Kai Ummaith Thappavittadhu; En Aantavan Mel En Kaiyaip Poten; Avarkarththaraal Apishekampannappattavaraame Endren.

11 en Thakappane Paarum; En Kaiyilirukkira Ummutaiya Saalvaiyin Thongalaip Paarum; Ummaik Kondru Potaamal, Ummutaiya Saalvaiyin Thongalai Aruththukkonten; En Kaiyile Pollaappum Thurokamum Illai Endrum, Umakku Naan Kutram Seyyavillai Endrum Arindhukollum; Neero En Piraananai Vaanga, Adhai Vettaiyaatukireer.
12 karththar Enakkum Umakkum Natu Nindru Niyaayam Visaariththu, Karththar Thaame En Kaariyaththil Umakku Needhiyaich Charikkattuvaaraaka; Ummutaiya Peril Naan Kaipotuvadhillai.
13 mudhiyor Mozhippatiye, Aakaadhavarkalitaththile Aakaamiyam Pirakkum; Aakaiyaal Ummutaiyaperil Naan Kai Potuvadhillai.
14 isravelin Raajaa Yaaraith Thetap Purappattaar? Oru Seththa Naayaiyaa, Oru Thelluppoochchiyaiyaa, Neer Yaaraip Pin Thotarukireer?
15 karththar Niyaayaadhipadhiyaayirundhu, Enakkum Umakkum Niyaayandheerththu, Enakkaaka Vazhakkaati, Naan Ummutaiya Kaikkuth Thappa Ennai Vituvippaaraaka Endraan.
16 thaaveedhu Indha Vaarththaikalaich Chavulote Solli Mutindhapinpu, Savul: En Kumaaranaakiya Thaaveedhe, Idhu Unnutaiya Saththamallavaa Endru Solli, Saththamittu Azhudhu,
17 thaaveedhaip Paarththu: Nee Ennaip Paarkkilum Needhimaan; Nee Enakku Nanmai Seydhaai; Naano Unakku Theemaiseydhen.
18 nee Enakku Nanmaiseydhadhai Indru Vilangappanninaai; Karththar Ennai Un Kaiyil Oppukkotuththirundhum, Nee Ennaik Kondrupotavillai.
19 oruvan Than Maatraanaik Kantu Pitiththaal, Avanaich Chukame Pokavituvaano? Indru Nee Enakkuch Cheydha Nanmaikkaakak Karththar Unakku Nanmai Seyvaaraaka.
20 nee Nichchayamaaka Raajaavaai Iruppaai Endrum, Isravelin Raajyapaaram Un Kaiyil Nilaivarappatum Endrum Ariven.
21 ippodhum Nee Enakkup Pinnirukkum En Sandhadhiyai Veraruppadhillai Endrum, En Thakappan Veettaaril En Peyarai Azhiththuppotuvadhillai Endrumkarththarmel Enakku Aanaiyittuk Kotu Endraan.
22 appozhudhu Thaaveedhu Savulukku Aanaiyittukkotuththaan; Pinpu, Savul Than Veettukkup Purappattupponaan; Thaaveedhum Avan Manusharum Aranippaana Itaththirku Eripponaarkal.
